document.full_text: the hansen natural corporation, the maker of monster energy drinks, posted a 50 percent increase in quarterly sales, setting off a 4.5 percent gain in its share price on friday.
document.title: business briefing | beverages: sales surge 50% for maker of monster energy drinks
lines_and_colors: the hansen natural corporation, the maker of monster energy drinks, posted a 50 percent increase in quarterly sales, setting off a 4.5 percent gain in its share price on friday.
